com.example.firstdesign.model

Class ShopKeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.firstdesign.model.ShopKeeper

  • public class ShopKeeper
extends java.lang.Object
    SINGLETON class that has to: Keep track of the {outsideofgame} points of the player. Keep track of the themes the player has bought. Keep a list of prices for each item.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ShopKeeper getInstance()
        Factory Method for Singleton object.
        Returns:
        Returns the single instance of ShopKeeper that there should be. Ideally, it should initialize INSTANCE if it's not initialized, and then return it.

      • addPoints

        public static void addPoints(int points)
        Add some points to the player's wallet.
        Parameters:
        points - Number of points to add.

      • getPoints

        public static int getPoints()
        Method to know how many points the owner has.
        Returns:
        Number of points in the wallet.

      • isThemePurchased

        public static boolean isThemePurchased(Themes theme)
        Method to know if a given theme has already been purchased.
        Parameters:
        theme - The theme in question
        Returns:
        True if the theme has been purchased, False otherwise.

      • buyTheme

        public static void buyTheme(Themes theme)
        Method to buy a theme. It should also mark the corresponding player skins as purchased.
        Parameters:
        theme - Theme to be bought.

      • getThemeCost

        public static int getThemeCost(Themes theme)
        Method to know how much a theme costs
        Parameters:
        theme - The theme in question.
        Returns:
        The number of points it costs.

      • isPlayerSkinPurchased

        public static boolean isPlayerSkinPurchased(PlayerSkins skin)
        Method to know if a certain player skin has been purchased.
        Parameters:
        skin - Skin to consult.
        Returns:
        True if the skin has been purchased, False otherwise.

      • buyPlayerSkin

        public static void buyPlayerSkin(PlayerSkins skin)
        Method to buy a certain player skin.
        Parameters:
        skin - Skin to be bought.

      • getPlayerSkinCost

        public static int getPlayerSkinCost(PlayerSkins skin)
        Method to know how much a certain skin costs.
        Parameters:
        skin - The skin in question.
        Returns:
        The price of the skin.
